Nightlight:

Nighlight continued crawling hoping that her husband had handg=
riped "I'm comming, I'm coming" muttered in the edge of sanity"we will come=
 back to home together... i'm coming" her obsession to reach him shadowed a=
ll the pain that she felt and the lost of energy was reaching a critical le=
vel.
